metadata.title: RZ/V: Introduction to RZ/V AI SDK

sections.content:
Question:
What is the RZ/V AI SDK? And what will be provided?
Answer:
AI Applications and AI SDK are quick and easy solutions for starting AI.
It provides various AI applications for free.
RZ/V AI Software Development Kit (AI SDK) is the most comprehensive solution for building end-to-end accelerated AI applications. AI SDK includes Yocto Linux with bootloader, Linux Kernel, Cross Compiler and a complete set of libraries for DRP-AI, graphics and codec.
Suitable Products
RZ/V
